questions.answer_description:
The percentage of time the world was ready to run.

A world in a run queue is waiting for CPU scheduler to let it run on a PCPU. %RDY accounts the percentage of this time. So, it is always smaller than 100%.
Reference: http://www.yellow-bricks.com/esxtop/

discussion.content: Percentage of time the resource pool, virtual machine, or world was ready to run, but was not provided CPU resources on which to execute. 100% = %RUN + %RDY + %CSTP + %WAIT

A & D Correct

Procedure
Navigate to the virtual machine.
Right-click the virtual machine and select Edit Settings.
On the Virtual Hardware tab, expand Hard disk to view the disk menu items.
To enable Flash Read Cache for the virtual machine, enter a value in the Virtual Flash Read Cache text box.
Click Advanced to specify the following parameters.
Reservation Select a cache size reservation.
Block Size Select a block size.
Click OK.

Source: https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/6.5/com.vmware.vsphere.vm_admin.doc/GUID-211CE783-51A8-4B65-BFF6-434D1C272308.html

questions.question_text: What two options are available when configuring a virtual flash resource on a virtual machine? (Choose two.)

A vSphere Administrator has stated that currently Private VLAN is utilized to prevent cross-talk on the dedicated backup network.
What two actions are required to implement Private VLAN in VMware vSphere? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Upgrade to VMware vSphere Enterprise Plus.
choices.D: Configure Private VLAN at the dvSwitch level.
choices.A: Configure Private VLAN at the dvPort Group.

comments.content: A&D would be correct. Sorry for the confusion!!
Partially correct. I would say B & D as A refers to implementing Private VLAN at Port level.

choices.D: Move all Objects to a new Datastore folder.
choices.A: Create an Object Inside the vApp.
choices.B: Add an Object to a vApp.
choices.C: Add an Object to the Datastore the vApp is located in.

questions.question_text: You need to add an object to an existing vApp using the vSphere Web Client. How is this accomplished?
What is the optimal configuration when building a virtual machine for a single-threaded Windows application?

choices.B: Deploy single-threaded applications on symmetric multi-processor virtual machines.
choices.C: Tune single-threaded applications to take advantage of symmetric multi-processor resources.
choices.D: Tune Single-threaded applications at the hypervisor level.
choices.A: Deploy single-threaded applications on uniprocessor virtual machines.
